fullText:
Psionic Accuracy

Prerequisite: Elf, elven accuracy racial power, any psionic class
Benefit: Your elven accuracy power gains the augmentable keyword. When you use this power, you can spend 1 power point to gain combat advantage against the target until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 389.
